sentences.en: Athlete's foot is a fungal infection.
Conclusion: PKP is an effective treatment for severe fungal keratitis.
sentences.cn: 结论: 穿透性角膜移植是治疗真菌性角膜炎的有效方法.

sentences.en: Fungal - decay can, in fact , originate within the standing tree.
sentences.cn: 菌腐朽可起源于立木阶段.
真菌类分类仍然是未定形的.

sentences.en: Fungal infections have assumed increasing importance in burns.
sentences.cn: 真菌感染在烧伤中占越来越重的地位.

sentences.en: Fungal pathogens are important natural biological control agents of aphids.
sentences.cn: 病原真菌是蚜虫的重要自然控制因子.

sentences.en: Fusion of fungal hyphae of differing genetic complements leads to heterokaryons.
sentences.cn: 异核体通常比同核体要生长的好.

sentences.en: Host resistance and fungal virulence parallel each other in the cross.
sentences.cn: 寄生的抗病性的病原菌的毒力在杂交中是势均力敌的.

sentences.en: Methods 114 cases with pulmonary fungal infection were retrospectively analyzed.
sentences.cn: 方法用回顾性调查的方法分析了114例肺部真菌感染的临床特征.

sentences.en: Nectarines exhibit different reactions to specific insect attacks and fungal infections than do peaches.
sentences.cn: 油桃对特定的虫害和病害感染的反应与桃相比有所不同.

sentences.en: The broth contained high concentration of amino nitrogen and fungal polysaccharide.
sentences.cn: 该发酵液含有较高的氨基态氮,香菇多糖.

sentences.en: The doctor gave her an anti - fungal application to use.
sentences.cn: 医生给了她一种抗真菌涂剂让她敷用.

sentences.en: The exposed wood protected with a wound - dressing compound to prevent fungal infection.
sentences.cn: 伤口露出的木质应以敷料包裹以防止病菌侵染.

sentences.en: This excess fungal yeast irritates the scalp, causing overproduction of skin cells.
sentences.cn: 这过量的真菌酵母刺激皮肤产生了过多的皮肤细胞.

sentences.en: Ventilation has been advocated for centuries as an inhibitor of fungal growth.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪来,人们都认为通风可以抑制霉菌生长.

trans.tran_cn: 真菌的，由真菌引起的，同“fungous”
trans.tran_en: connected with or caused by a  fungus
